headline: Lululemon Founder’s Proxy Fight Puts Governance And Valuation In Focus
summary: Founder Chip Wilson has launched a proxy fight at lululemon athletica, targeting the current board structure at NasdaqGS:LULU. Wilson is nominating new independent directors and calling for annual elections, citing weak governance and limited engagement with creative leadership. The campaign focuses on stronger shareholder involvement and tighter board oversight of brand and product decisions. Lululemon athletica, trading on NasdaqGS:LULU, is facing a very public governance challenge as...
